name: Pink Ponytail

## Pink Ponytail

A playful ponytail in a delightful pink color.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
